name: Undead Stapley and the Deadly Castle
name_original: Undead Stapley and the Deadly Castle
description:
You are Stapely the Undead Skeleton, you wake up at the bottom of a dungeon realizing that you are dead and disjointed, so you decide to gather your bones and teach the other skeletons a lesson, while climbing up to the entrance of your dungeon to rejoin your lost love, Princess Nectarine.

Will you succeed?

CONTROLS

Press A or D to move

Press SPACE to jump and climb ledges

Press the Left Mouse Button to throw your Boomerarms.

FONT CREDITS

https://www.dafont.com/04b-30.font
